record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1903. Fourth row: R. B. Kelly, George Senn, James Franklin Carroll, Arthur M. Sullivan, and Edward Reed Ferriss; third row: John Carroll Moore, Mark Seavey Catlin, Frederick Adolph Speik, and Ernest Eugene Quantrell; second row: Charles Ferguson Kennedy, Fred Taylor Hall, Jerome Pratt Magee (captain), William Gorham Matthews, and Clarence Jandt Buckwalter; first row: Amos Alonzo Stagg (coach), Thomas Barnett Taylor, Clyde Amel Blair, Mortimer Llewellyn Cahill, Hugo Morris Friend, and Edwin Manson Neher.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
